Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 23rd overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Andrew Hutzler (NY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/2015, off Val Chacko (KC)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New York on 7/29/2015...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2016, hitting .381 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2016...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/3/2017 to a 2-year deal worth $4,250,750 per year...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2017...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2018...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/4/2019 to a 3-year deal worth $9,100,000 per year...
